00001 import SocketServer, threading
00002 from SimpleXMLRPCServer import SimpleXMLRPCServer, SimpleXMLRPCRequestHandler
00003 import peerhandler
00004 
00005 class AsyncXMLRPCServer(SocketServer.ThreadingMixIn, SimpleXMLRPCServer): 
00006     allow_reuse_address = True
00007 
00008 online = True
00009 def kill():
00010     global online
00011     online = False
00012     return True
00013 
00014 
00015 port = peerhandler.gaParams.getVar('port')
00016 
00017 class ServerThread(threading.Thread):
00018 
00019     def __init__(self):
00020         threading.Thread.__init__(self)
00021         self.online = True
00022 
00023     def run(self):
00024         server = AsyncXMLRPCServer(('', port))
00025         server.register_function(kill, '__kill__')
00026         server.register_instance(peerhandler.PeerHandler())
00027         global online
00028         try:
00029             while online:
00030                 server.handle_request()
00031         finally:
00032             server.server_close()
00033 
00034         server.server_close()
